name: Woodmark Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at the Woodmark for several days last month. I had my parents stay there a few years back, and they raved about it, so I thought I'd give it a try.
reviews.title: Charming place...sometimes...
this is a great hotel
reviews.text: Our room was small but comfortable, with nice furnishings, a comfy bed and a lake view. Room service was prompt and delicious, and the bell staff were all great.

reviews.title: A quietly great hotel
reviews.text: And then the parties began. On both Friday and Saturday evenings, the hotel was hosting wedding receptions in a large outdoor tent next to the lounge, abd just beneath our room. The live music was incredibly loud in the room; on Friday, we were told it would be over at 10 PM, and it did go on till 10:30. In Saturday, the music was even louder; we called the front desk to complain, and we were told it would be over by 11:00. And yet it went on...11:15, 11:30...my friend ran down to the front desk, and they told him it was actually going on until 12:00. They offered to move us to a suite down the hall...we had several valuable musical instruments and piecs of electronic equipment, and that would have been far more trouble than it was worth.

description: This is found in Kirkland, a little suburb of Lake Washington. It is near a marina, which has restaurants, shops, and a spa.
